title: 'Parents are concerned, teachers are anxious': Tasmanian Premier urges parents to keep kids home
description: Tasmanian Premier Peter Gutwein says schools will remain open, but from Monday parents should keep their children at home, as the state's coronavirus tally reaches 47.
content:
Posted March 27, 2020 11:09:05 Tasmania's Premier is urging parents to keep children home from school, as the total number of coronavirus cases in the state reaches 47. Tasmania COVID-19 snapshot
  • Confirmed cases: 47
  • Tests conducted: 1,272… [+2886 chars]
